## ToyGL package

A low-level WebGL library.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [createGuid()](./toygl.createguid.md) | Creates a Globally unique identifier (GUID) string. A GUID is 128 bits long, and can guarantee uniqueness across space and time. |
|  [defaultValue(value, defaultValue)](./toygl.defaultvalue.md) | Returns the first parameter if not undefined, otherwise the second parameter. Useful for setting a default value for a parameter. |
